title: About Me
subtitle: FILM NERD. MUSIC SNOB. GAME OF THRONES-ER.
text: Currently a Senior Front End Developer at AmazeRealise.

I'm a self-taught front-end developer who is passionate about the latest web technologies and likes to use a React + Node.js + Webpack stack with Sass or CSS-in-JS. Originally from a musical background, I learned how to code from my ambition to build mobile-first, feature-rich web applications.
